meanings.definition: A traditional garment worn in various countries in the Middle East.
meanings.sent1: During the festival, everyone wore their best galabiyah.
meanings.sent2: The intricate embroidery on her galabiyah was stunning.
meanings.sent3: The galabiyah party was a hit with all the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her galabiyah was a tapestry of memories and traditions.
meanings.sent5: The scent of spices lingered on the old galabiyah.
